body:
In #13727, we added a public API accepting a stream while retaining the old overload that does not accept a stream. We are migrating to requiring streams in public APIs, so the old overload without a stream should be removed. We decided to accept this for 23.08 (during burndown) with the intent to fix in 23.10.

cc: @mythrocks @vyasr

comments.body: The title here sounds like a duplicate of #11463, but I think the work here is a subset of that (a single API, and just a removal of the old API).

milestone.title: Enable streams
milestone.description: Enable safe usage of a stream-ordered libcudf API

title: Require streams in public API for groupby aggregate.
